item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my corner of the internet where I share my thoughts, experiences, and passions. I’m Vishwamitra Hegde, though you might hear others refer to me as Vishwa or Vish for short. By profession, I’m a Software Engineer with over a decade of experience developing scalable software solutions across various domains and industries. Beyond the confines of code, I’m an avid explorer, whether it’s delving into the latest technologies or venturing into the great outdoors.

item.title: Choosing the right tool for blogging
item.description: So in the peak pandamic, I needed someting to pass my time, so decided to create a blog site. I initially thought of handcrafting myself with the ReactJs as I thout this will be a learning for me but soon realised it’s going to be not easy as I don’t like CSS that much. Though I had a bit of experince working with react I don’t consider myself as an expert UI developer.
